chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 81 (59)—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. He and Lan could strike sparks if their stares ever met. See also Amys; Lian.
